'''''Latecoming Diadochus''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to enter [[Domus Aurea]] during the {{Quest|Fortune Plango Vulnera}}.

==Trivia ==
* The name of this achievement refers to the {{Lang|{{w|Diadochi}}|el_tl=Successor|el=Διάδοχοι}}, the factions that fought for the control of {{W|Alexander the Great}}'s empire after his death.
